data.title: 88 Champion Tournament
data.description: The player earns tokens for slot wins. Depending on the number of tokens collected, the player ranks on the tournament leaderboard and receives rewards.

linkedNews.title: 88 Champion tournament change
linkedNews.description: Bonuses have been added to league rewards.

blocks.text: What changed compared to the previous version

Passive bonuses have been added to league rewards. They are valid for the entire week of the competition. The tournament is now focused not only on obtaining short-term rewards for a place, but also on providing long-term benefits through league bonuses.

New types of bonuses:

  • increase in the [periodic bonus|832329]
  • additional benefit when purchasing [coins|717659], which applies to all special activities

Similar bonuses are also found in other Casino games:

  • [Lotsa Slots|827968]
  • [Jackpot Party Casino|830557]

elements.description: Bonuses have been added to league rewards

blocks.text:
Tournament mechanics

  • the player joins the leaderboard of 100 players
  • when hitting BigWins in [slots|720218], the player receives tokens. The higher the bet, the more tokens the player receives
  • the top 70 players in the leaderboard receive rewards at the end of the tournament

Additional information

  • the tournament becomes available at player level 22. When the tournament starts for the first time, the player begins in the first league — Bronze
  • the tournament has leagues
  • players receive bonuses at the end of the tournament depending on the league they moved to
  • the tournament has a multiplier, which increases the number of tokens received

Flow

elements.description: After reaching level 22, the tournament window automatically appears
The player spins slots and receives tokens for Big Wins. The higher the bet, the more tokens the player receives
The player’s position on the leaderboard, shown on the left side of the slot window, is determined by the number of tokens collected
At the end of the tournament, the player receives a reward based on their position on the leaderboard
Players receive bonuses at the end of the tournament depending on the league they moved to
The (i) button opens a window with a description of the tournament mechanics
Tournament mechanics description window
Scrolling right, the player will view the tournament mechanics
Scrolling right, the player will view the tournament mechanics
Scrolling right, the player will view the tournament mechanics
Scrolling right, the player will view the tournament mechanics

blocks.text:
Additional mechanics for obtaining tokens

The player can receive tokens:

  • in [event|739448] rewards
  • as part of [Fortune Chest|742584] rewards

elements.description: Tokens can be obtained from event rewards
Tokens can be obtained as part of chest rewards

blocks.text:
Multiplier specifics

  • after receiving the golden Fairy Card through the [daily tasks|722520] rewards, the player receives a tournament token multiplier
  • the tournament token multiplier increases the number of tokens received
  • after receiving the multiplier, it is automatically activated and lasts until the end of the tournament
  • the multiplier has 5 levels. The higher the level, the more tokens the player receives
  • the player increases the multiplier level every day by receiving the golden Fairy Card through the [daily tasks|722520] rewards

elements.description: The multiplier is shown on the right side of the event window. The tournament token multiplier increases the number of tokens received
The multiplier has 5 levels. Swiping right reveals all the multiplier levels. The higher the level, the more tokens the player receives
After obtaining the golden Fairy Card through daily task rewards, the player receives a tournament token multiplier
After being received, the multiplier is automatically activated and remains in effect until the end of the tournament
By receiving a golden Fairy Card through the daily challenge rewards, the player increases the multiplier level daily

blocks.text:
Leagues

  • there are 10 leagues: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Amber, Sapphire, Crystal, Opal, Diamond, and Master
  • at the end of each tournament, the top 15 players in the leaderboard are promoted to the higher league. The next 55 players remain in their league, and the rest are demoted to the lower league
  • the player starts a new tournament in the league they moved to as a result of the previous tournament
  • the higher the league, the better the rewards
  • the player receives bonuses depending on the league. The higher the league, the better bonuses the player receives
  • there are no bonuses for the Bronze league

The player can receive:

  • increase in the [periodic bonus|731101]
  • additional benefit when purchasing [coins|717659], which applies to all special activities: bonus to the number of [coins|717659] when purchasing packs in the [store|832383], in [special deals|839139], and in the [piggy bank|839907]

elements.description: Tournament window. The league name is shown on the right
Tapping the "i" button opens a tooltip with league rewards
Rewards the player can receive for the tournament
The higher the league, the better the rewards
Example of league rewards

The league promotion zone is highlighted in green on the leaderboard. The top 15 players advance to the higher league at the end of the tournament, while players in the purple zone remain in their current league
The league demotion zone is highlighted in red. Players ranked 70th to 100th move down to the lower league at the end of the tournament
Information about leagues is shown in the tournament mechanics window
When moving to the Silver league and higher, the player receives bonuses. Bonuses are valid for a week and change with the change of league
Active bonuses are displayed above the league icon
No bonuses are provided for the Bronze league
The player can receive an increase in the periodic bonus
The player can receive a bonus to the number of coins when purchasing packs in the store
The player can receive an increase in coins as part of special offers
The player can receive an increase in coins in the piggy bank
Information about bonuses is shown in the tournament mechanics window. Scrolling left, the player will view all the bonuses
Scrolling left, the player will view all the bonuses
Scrolling left, the player will view all the bonuses
Scrolling left, the player will view all the bonuses

blocks.text:
Tournament rewards depending on the place in the leaderboard

The top 70 players in the leaderboard receive rewards at the end of the tournament. The player can receive:

  • [coins|717659]
  • chips for the [Lucky Paw mechanic|734213]
  • crystals for completing goals in [daily tasks|722520]
  • access to the [Dragon Wheel|832329]

blocks.text:
How to access the tournament

  • the tournament button is on the [home screen|717388]
  • the tournament leaderboard is displayed on the left side of the [slot window|748887] in landscape orientation, or at the top in portrait orientation

elements.description: Home screen: tournament button
Slot window in horizontal screen orientation: tournament leaderboard
Slot window in vertical screen orientation: tournament leaderboard

updates.title: League rewards now include passive, long-term bonuses
League rewards now include passive, long-term bonuses
